description: Find the Parity of a number. The Parity of a number is 1 if the binary representation has an odd number of 1's and 0 if the number of 1's is even. You input is the decimal representation of the number.
First Line: decimal representation of the number.
Output a single value equal to the parity of the number.
For the sample above please print 0 because Parity( 15 (decimal) ) = Parity( 1111 ) = 0.
